imagetofits(image, ftot, fdata, frgl, name='Image.fits')
plotGanEvolution(disFakeLoss, disRealLoss, genLoss, disFakeAccuracy, genAccuracy)
parameters:

epoch: array containing the epochs to be plotted on the x-newaxis discrFakeLoss: cost values for the discriminators response to fake(generated) image data discrRealLoss: cost values for the discriminators response to real(model) image data genLoss: cost values for the generator discrFakeAccuracy: accuracy values for the discriminators response to fake(generated) image data discrRealAccuracy: accuracy values for the discriminators response to real(model) image data genAccuracy: accuracy values for the generator

effect:

Plots the cost and accuracy terms as a function of epoch and stores the resulting plots

plotLossEvol(Chi2, DisLoss)
plot_generated_images(epoch, examples=36, dim=(6, 6), figsize=(15, 9))
parameters:

epoch: the epoch at which th plots are made, used for naming the image generator: the generator neural network during the given epochs examples: the number of examples to be displayed in the plot

effect:

saves images contain a number of random example images created by the generator

load()

load_data_fromCube()
parameters:

dir: a directory where the training images can be found (must contain * to expand and find multiple images) imagesize: the size to which the obtained images will be rescaled (imagesize*imagesize pixels)

returns:

images: a numpy array containing the image information and dimensions (number of images *imagesize*imagesize*1 )
